value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Attention! Colonel, we got a situation!

value.speaker: Colonel
value.text: Yes! ma'am, but why did you send me a spoon?

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Because country A just broke through our border and accused us of storing chemical weapons! What a nonsense!

value.speaker: Colonel
value.text: Understood! But why spoon...

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: NO BUT! Can you see that pot? Use it to destroy our enemies!

value.speaker: Colonel
value.text: But...

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: NO!! BUT!! Grab one barrel to deploy soldiers by dropping them into that pot! And use your spoon to stir them to the battlefield(Press A&D as fast as you can)!

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: If you start to stir, you can not deploy soldiers anymore until you stir all of them in the pot to the battlefield, Understood?! Commander out.

value.speaker: Colonel
value.text: Yes! Ma'ma!

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Nice work! Colonel! But we got another problem.Our enemy is too strong to fight only with the infantry!

value.speaker: Colonel
value.text: Masaka(＃°Д°)

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: What? Never mind, And we will start to deploy our armored forces!

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Remeber, they must coordinate with infantry to keep in top shape! The perfect ratio is tank to soldier 1:2. Keep that in mind, or you can look at the top to know what is your forces' statement.

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: If you can keep ratio state on perfect before you stir, it will double your army power! Commander out.

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: That is a tough fight...But we survive anyway.

value.speaker: Colonel
value.text: Thanks to your command, ma'am!

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Don't be happy too soon, they sent their air forces just an hour ago, and we must send ours.

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: What? What's wrong with you today? Never mind.

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: You got the authority to send some jets, but remember you must keep the ratio too. The best ratio of  jet : tank : soldier is 1 : 3 : 6, keep that in mind, understood?

value.speaker: Colonel
value.text: Yes, ma'am!

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Commander out.

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Well done, soldier! Country A is scared now, keep fighting back and make them silence! Maybe we should accuse them of storing chemical weapons...

value.speaker: Colonel
value.text: I don't think that is a good idea, ma'am!

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Just a joking! Don't be so serious!

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Keep fighting, Commander out.

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: Yeah! Good Stir!

value.speaker: Colonel
value.text: Thank you, ma'ma!

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: We struck them hard! It looks the next fight will be our last fight today!

value.speaker: Commander-in-chief ON AIR
value.text: GO! To win your glory soldier! Commander out.

value.speaker: Sound of Mysterious
value.text: And then you lost your battle. They broke through your border and headed over to your capital. Three days later, they "found" some chemical weapons in an empty depot.

value.speaker: Sound of Mysterious
value.text: Bad end: You Lost. Click to rechallenge.

value.speaker: Sound of Mysterious
value.text: You win the war. But you feel something wrong in your head. Suddenly you are summoned before the Gate...

value.speaker: Sound of Mysterious
value.text: After you recover your consciousness, you decide to leave the army. Head to A country and become a state alchemist. Aiming for the Philosopher's Stone.

value.speaker: Sound of Mysterious
value.text: Good End?: Fullmetal Alchemist.

value.speaker: VSakuya
value.text: Thanks for your playing my first work! It is my honor if you enjoy this game! I have no time to make credits, so that's all! Thanks again! ヾ(≧▽≦*)o

value.speaker: Sound of Mysterious
value.text: After you recover your consciousness, you find yourself standing in an empty white space with some black lines.

value.speaker: Sound of Mysterious
value.text: Hidden end: Artifical Idiot. Click to rechallenge.
